name: Andlauer Healthcare Group Inc. Subordinate Voting Shares
longDescription: Andlauer Healthcare Group Inc is an investment holding company. It operates in two segments namely Specialized Transportation and Healthcare Logistics. The company generates maximum revenue from the Specialized Transportation segment. Its Specialized Transportation segment provides specialized temperature controlled services to healthcare customers. The company's transportation products include ground transportation, air freight forwarding, and dedicated and last mile delivery. The Healthcare Logistics segment provides contract logistics services for customers, including logistics and distribution, and packaging.

fullAddress: 100 Vaughan Valley Boulevard, Vaughan, ON, CA
